ApiKey.Name: API Key
ApiKey.Hint: Enter your API key to authenticate with the Archivist API service

SemanticMappingEnabled.Name: Enable semantic field mapping
SemanticMappingEnabled.Hint: Use a small local embeddings model to improve field detection

SelectedWorld.Name: Selected World ID
SelectedWorld.Hint: The ID of the currently selected world from the Archivist API

SelectedWorldName.Name: Selected World
SelectedWorldName.Hint: The name of the currently selected world from the Archivist API

ChatHistory.Name: Chat History
ChatHistory.Hint: Internal storage for Archivist Chat message history

MappingOverride.Name: Mapping Override (JSON)
MappingOverride.Hint: Optional JSON rules to customize importer field mapping
